trans-unit.source: Apart from being used by myself as the software that drives my personal blog, it is also a useful showcase for various TG programming patterns.
trans-unit.target: 除了被我自己用作驱动个人博客的软件外,它也是各种TG编程模式的有益展示。

trans-unit.source: CBlog is a simple weblog application based on the TurboGears_ framework.
trans-unit.target: CBlog是一个基于TurboGears_框架的简单网络日志应用。

trans-unit.source: The software is currently in alpha state, because the data model and the API (internal and external, i.e. URls) may still change frequently and some features I consider important are still missing. That being said, I already use it on a regular basis for my own blog site.
trans-unit.target: 这个软件目前还处于alpha状态,因为数据模型和API(内部和外部,即URls)可能还经常变化,一些我认为重要的功能还没有实现。也就是说,我已经在自己的博客网站上经常使用它了。
